iati-activity.title: WaterAid Niger
iati-activity.description: Niger is one of the poorest countries in the world, occupying the bottom end of the Human Development Index and has extremely low water and sanitation coverage rates. Niger is an ecologically fragile environment so we will deepen our expertise around water resource management in extremely water-stressed areas, providing valuable evidence for use in our work around the global climate change debate.We have already supported local governments in the six areas in which we will be working to help them develop local plans, which include water, sanitation and hygiene services.
iati-activity.activity-date: Financial year that WaterAid (re)started activities within the country

contact-info.mailing-address: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK

budget.period-start: Forward looking data for WaterAid's 2012-2013 financial year (1st April to 31st March) are drawn from WaterAid's approved aspirational budgets and are estimates as at March 2013. The actual figures achieved will vary depending on a range of factors including the securing of the funding needed, challenges faced in the countries, etc.
budget.period-end: End of WaterAid 2012-13 financial year (1st April to 31st March)
